plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_letters
plurals.item: Nenosiri lazima liwe kwa angalau herufi %d
Nenosiri lazima liwe na angalau herufi 1

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: Nenosiri lazima liwe na angalau herufi %d kubwa
Nenosiri lazima liwe kwa angalau herufi 1 ndogo

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: Nenosiri lazima liwe na angalau herufi %d kubwa
Nenosiri lazima liwe na angalau herufi 1 kubwa

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_numeric
plurals.item: Nenosiri lazima liwe na angalau dijiti ya numeriki %d
Nenosiri lazima liwe na angalau dijiti ya numeriki 1

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: Nenosiri lazima liwe na angalau alama maalum %d
Nenosiri lazima liwe na angalau alama 1 maalum

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: Nenosiri lazima liwe na angalau vibambo visivyo na herufi %d
Lazima nenosiri liwe na angalau kibambo 1 kisicho cha barua
